name: 4444 (itch)
description:
4444 is a puzzle game where you need to merge four squares of the same color and size to form a bigger square of the same color. Join all the squares on the board into one and complete the level. As the game unfolds, levels get more and more challenging and new elements are introduced.

  • Over 80 brain-teasing, epiphany-inducing, stress-relieving levels.
  • Three game modes will keep you busy for weeks.
  • Unique game mechanics.
  • Sugar-free: no candies, jellies, or other fattening nonsense.
  • Beautiful minimalist graphics with a retro hint.
